snippet.title: SAMURAI WARRIORS 4 DX - Steam Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
AVAILABLE NOW:  https://store.steampowered.com/app/2719200/?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=DXAnnounce&utm_id=caption

SAMURAI WARRIORS 4 DX is now available on Steam®!

Experience the intense battles that take place in the Warring States period of Japan, with more than 50 playable officers.

Includes more than 150 downloadable contents such as costumes, weapons, edit parts, scenarios and BGM.

Follow us on:
X: https://twitter.com/koeitecmoeurope
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/koeitecmoeurope/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/koeitecmogames
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/KTEurope
